attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I put no trust in divine beings.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: I have a dark calling that puts me above the law. (Chaotic)

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I have certain rituals that I must follow every day. I can never break them.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: A terrible guilt consumes me. I hope that I can find redemption through my actions.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LERwwegh0JQ7Lkag4w7_description
attribs.current:
Skill Proficiencies. Choose one of Arcana, Investigation, Religion, or Survival
Languages. Choose one exotic language (Abyssal, Celestial, Deep Speech, Draconic, Infernal, Primordial, Sylvan, or Undercommon)
Equipment. Monster hunter's pack, one trinket of special significance (choose one or roll on the Gothic Trinkets table)
Feature: Heart of Darkness. Those who look into your eyes can see that you have faced unimaginable horror and that you are no stranger to darkness. Though they might fear you, commoners will extend you every courtesy and do their utmost to help you. Unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them, they will even take up arms to fight alongside you, should you find yourself facing an enemy alone.
Harrowing Event. Prior to becoming an adventurer, your path in life was defined by one dark moment, one fateful decision, or one tragedy. Now you feel a darkness threatening to consume you, and you fear there may be no hope of escape. Choose a harrowing event that haunts you, or roll 1d10.

Includes:

• a backpack

• a crowbar

• a hammer

• 10 pitons

• 10 torches

• a tinderbox

• 10 days of rations

• a waterskin

• 50 feet of hempen rope

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LESbey1H9cfny6godz2_description
attribs.current:
When you cast eldritch blast, add your Wisdom
modifier to the damage it deals on a hit.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEY4h7L3-F-wxZxVZm-_description
attribs.current: The archetypal Eldritch Knight combines the martial mastery common to all fighters with a careful study of magic. Eldritch Knights use magical techniques similar to those practiced by wizards. They focus their study on two of the eight schools o f magic: abjuration and evocation. Abjuration spells grant an Eldritch Knight additional protection in battle, and evocation spells deal damage to many foes at once, extending the fighter’s reach in combat. These knights learn a comparatively small number o f spells, committing them to memory instead o f keeping them in a spellbook.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEY6h6m9dNClTmwDfNC_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 2d6ro<2, Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEY7petczHVHxJna1mh_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEY9bGCoN06NUl48vsJ_description
attribs.current: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee w eapon that you are wielding with two hands, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. The weapon must have the two-handed or versatile property for you to gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEYA3ZSIFblsinpasR4_description
attribs.current:
You have a limited well o f stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use
a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d 10 [[1d10]]  + [[4]] your fighter level.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEYABTykBvZkc7joiGN_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take  one additional action on top o f your regular action and a possible bonus action.

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. Starting at 17th level, you can use it twice before a rest, but only once on the same turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEYAdWMtYlrQY9tZhDg_description
attribs.current: At 3rd level, you learn a ritual that creates a magical bond between yourself and one weapon. You perform the ritual over the course o f 1 hour, which can be done during a short rest. The weapon must be within your reach throughout the ritual, at the conclusion of which you touch the weapon and forge the bond. Once you have bonded a weapon to yourself, you can’t be disarmed o f that w eapon unless you are incapacitated. If it is on the same plane of existence, you can summon that weapon as a bonus action on your turn, causing it to teleport instantly to your hand. You can have up to two bonded w eapons, but can summon only one at a time with your bonus action. If you attempt to bond with a third w eapon, you must break the bond with one o f the other two.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LEYBe0V-54Orlff3r-O_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a successful melee attack with a weapon against one creature. On hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and fire leaps to a different visible creature of choice within 5 feet of it. The fire deals damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier. [[2]]

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LEYBe0V-54Orlff3r-O_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 [[1d8]] fire damage to the target, and the flame increases to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier [[2]]. Both damages increase by 1d8 at 11th([[1d8]]) and 17th level ([[1d8]]).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LEYCcZGh41x8w8Cw36l_spelldescription
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a Strength save or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward you. It takes 1d8 [[1d8]] lightning damage if it is within 5 feet of you.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LEYCcZGh41x8w8Cw36l_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: This spell's damage increases by 1d8 [[1d8]] when you reach 5th, [[1d8]]11th, and [[1d8]]17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEYDgviq26yi0-klR4G_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEYDFCcUR8Vwc5Pd5Dh_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a ranged spell attack against a creature you can see. You choose the damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. If the attack hits, the creature takes 3d8 damage of the type you chose.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEYDFCcUR8Vwc5Pd5Dh_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEYM6xfkoJmXMRq8Hco_itemcontent
attribs.current: While holding this shield, you have a +1 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEYMNEwR5Na3z5oxz11_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEYMNEwR5Na3z5oxz11_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEYMQFyfDhr1zwPHJZO_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEYMhdTZXnGNiAsNmDv_description
attribs.current: Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your level when you gain this feat. Whenever you gain a level thereafter, your hit point maximum increases by an additional 2 hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEbGIgQyPFb-pqLlkXG_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a ranged spell attack against that creature. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 lightning damage, and on each of your turns for the duration, you can use your action to deal 1d12 lightning damage to the target automatically. The spell ends if you use your action to do anything else. The spell also ends if the target is ever outside the spell's range or if it has total cover from you.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEbGIgQyPFb-pqLlkXG_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: The initial damage increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LEbHAwN79WgIvFlabWs_atk_desc
attribs.current: Make a ranged spell attack against that creature. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 lightning damage, and on each of your turns for the duration, you can use your action to deal 1d12 lightning damage to the target automatically. The spell ends if you use your action to do anything else. The spell also ends if the target is ever outside the spell's range or if it has total cover from you.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEc50FTGE-2Gybq8AUY_description
attribs.current:
You have learned techniques to enhance your attacks with certain kinds o f spells, gaining the following benefits:

• When you cast a spell that requires you to make an attack roll, the spell’s range is doubled.

• Your ranged spell attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

• You learn one cantrip that requires an attack roll.

Choose the cantrip from the bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell list. Your spellcasting ability for this cantrip depends on the spell list you chose from: Charisma for bard, sorcerer, or warlock; Wisdom for cleric or druid; or Intelligence for wizard.
